Reception Given on National Day of Switzerland
   Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- Rainer Baudendistel, country director a.i. of SDC in Pyongyang, Tuesday hosted a reception on the occasion of the national day of Switzerland.
 Present there on invitation were officials concerned, diplomatic envoys of various countries and representatives of international organizations here.    
 Speeches were made there.

Japan Urged to Withdraw Step to Cancel Tax Exemption
articles.content:
Japan Urged to Withdraw Step to Cancel Tax Exemption
   Pyongyang, August 2 (KCNA) -- The Kanagawa Prefectural Headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) held a press conference in connection with the fact that the mayor of Yokohama, Kanagawa Prefecture, Japan, on July 24 cancelled the step to exempt the facilities related to Chongryon from the payment of fixed property and city planning taxes, according to Joson Sinbo, the organ of the Central Standing Committee of Chongryon.
 A written request addressed to the mayor of Yokohama which was read out at the press conference said that it was a very rude act for Yokohama city to have unilaterally cancelled the exemption step in violation of laws and regulations.    
 The mayor should immediately withdraw the unjust step taken to cancel the tax exemption for the Korean Hall, it held, demanding the Japanese government take positive steps to prevent outcries, violence and threats against Koreans in Japan.
